cards.title: Armsmaster
powers: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Equipment card, put it in your hand; otherwise shuffle it back
incapacitatedAbilities: Armsmaster deals 1 irreducible melee damage to a target
One player may search their trash for an Equipment card and put it in their hand

cards.title: Original Halberd
powers: Armsmaster may deal 2 melee damage to a target. You may activate a [u]Primary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Primary. You may activate a [u]Secondary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Secondary
cards.body: Modules may be attached to this card; one primary and one secondary

cards.title: Survey Halberd
powers: Draw a card. You may activate a [u]Primary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Primary. You may activate a [u]Secondary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Secondary
cards.body: Modules may be attached to this card; one primary and one secondary

cards.title: Experimental Halberd
powers: Armsmaster may deal 1 irreducible energy damage to a target. You may activate a [u]Primary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Primary. You may activate a [u]Secondary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Secondary
cards.body: Modules may be attached to this card; one primary and one secondary

cards.title: Grapple Halberd
powers: You may destroy an environment card. You may activate a [u]Primary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Primary. You may activate a [u]Secondary[/u] text on a Module attached to this card as Secondary
cards.body: Modules may be attached to this card; one primary and one secondary

cards.title: Return In A Flash
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck or your trash until you reveal a Halberd. Either put it into play or into your hand. Return the other cards and shuffle your deck.

cards.title: Equipment Stash
body: Search your deck for an Equipment card and either put it into play or into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.title: Dual Wielding
body: Use a power on a Halberd

cards.title: Quick Adjustment
body: At the end of your turn you may return a Module in play to your hand. If you do, you may play a Module
Whenever an Equipment card would be destroyed you may destroy this card instead

cards.title: Flamethrower
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: Armsmaster deals 2 fire damage to a non-hero target

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Destroy an Environment card

cards.title: Combat Prediction Array
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: Reveal the top 3 cards of the villain deck and put them back in any order

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Until the start of your next turn reduce damage dealt to Armsmaster by villain cards by 1

cards.title: Recycler
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: Draw a card

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Activate the [u]Secondary[/u] text of another Module attached to the card this card is attached to

cards.title: Medicator
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: All hero targets regain 1 HP

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Armsmaster regains 2 HP

cards.title: Grapple
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: Armsmaster deals 1 projectile damage to up to 2 non-hero targets

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Destroy an Ongoing card

cards.title: Accelerator
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: All heroes may draw a card

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: A hero other than Armsmaster may play a card

cards.title: Stasis Effector
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: Discard 2 cards. If you do, the next time a villain card would be played prevent it; and until the start of your next turn all villain character cards are immune to damage

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Destroy a target with 4 or less HP

cards.title: Targeting Computer
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: Select a hero target. The next time that hero target would deal damage, increase the damage by 1 and make it irreducible

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Select a target. At the start of Armsmaster's next turn, he deals that target 4 projectile damage

cards.title: Static Field Generator
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: Armsmaster deals 2 lightning damage to a non-hero target

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: Armsmaster deals 1 lightning damage to all targets with 3 or less HP

cards.title: Communicator
body: Attach this card to a Halberd, either as Primary or Secondary

activatableAbilities.name: primary
activatableAbilities.text: A hero other than Armsmaster may use a power

activatableAbilities.name: secondary
activatableAbilities.text: A hero other than Armsmaster may play a card
